name: Mataba (River Spirit)
shortLoreBlurb: Mataba (River Spirit) is a spirit from Congo Basin associated with floods, bargains. Appeased for safe passage and rains.

description: Mataba (River Spirit) is a spirit from Congo Basin associated with floods, bargains. Appeased for safe passage and rains.
